description:
Tree works in a Conservation Area.

Rear garden:   Chestnut: Crown thin by 15%, remove dead wood, judiciously reduce overhang back from garden side only by 15% to separate crown from neighbouring tree (51 Compton Road) whilst preserving as much screen as is practicable whilst preserving basic height and crown spread.

Beech:  Overhanging from No. 53.  Reduce overhang back to previous reduction points, approximately 20%.  Works as general maintenance and to control size and encroachment.

Rear Garden: Chestnut: Crown thin by 15%, remove dead wood, judiciously reduce overhang back from garden side only by 15% to separate crown from neighbouring tree (51 Compton Road) whilst preserving as much screen as is practicable whilst preserving basic height and crown spread. Beech: Overhanging from no. 53. Reduce overhang back to previous reduction points, approx. 20%. Works as general maintenance and to control size and encroachment
